Reviews.Title: New and Not charging............
Reviews.Author: nigel orr
Reviews.Content: New device with defective battery. Tablet not charging! can only work when plugged in. Very disappointed with item. Will try Samsung in future.

Reviews.Title: good for cheap large tablet
Reviews.Author: legbert "Legbert"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and she only uses it for watching netflix, facebook and some games. It works great for her needs and was the lowest price for a large 10 inch screen like she wanted. It comes with a usb charger which works but the wall charger is European or Australian (not for US plugs basically). It says it in the product details so I was prepared but that was a surprise for her when she opened the box. Just an FYI; plan ahead to either not use that charger or go ahead and buy a converter for it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Dual-core Android Tablet 10.1"
1GB DDR3 and 8GB flash memory
With Front and rear Cameras
Support HDMI Output
Build-in Wifi, support external 3G dongle
ProductInfo.Name: Riin 10.1-inch 8gb Tablet Allwinner A20 Dual-core Android 4.2 1gb DDR with Dual Camera Hdmi Output(white)
